DOC.brief_summary: In second phase multicenter study investigator go evaluate use three different videolaryngoscopes patient undergo elective surgery require general anesthesia intubation . The investigator hypothesize three videolaryngoscopes succeed intubation first attempt least 90 % case use difficult airway simulation extrication collar . As gold standard , standard Macintosh blade use comparison . The study consist 4 arm . Each arm include 120 patient , sum total 480 patient .
DOC.criteria: elective surgery general anesthesia require intubation > 18 year old ASA IIII know presumed difficult airway risk pulmonary aspiration refuse participate
